title: PLEASE let us reorder rune pages.
body: I have 11 rune pages, and it's already a gigantic pain in the mikta to add a page in the front.  I'm going to be buying a lot more pages soon, since I'm nearly done buying all the champs, and I dread the amount of time I'm going to be spending tediously changing every single rune page just to add one where I want it.

replies.body: Nothing to say. Just "Rito plz".
This isn't Nidalee QQ thread, mate.
Isnt every thread a little bit of a Nidalee QQ thread, deep down.
For me every thread is an Annie QQ thread.

But but but, I really like the idea of having to take screenshots of each rune page, then clearing them, then painstakingly recreating them so they're in some kind of logical order (alpha-getti-betical, by role etc), then a week later, having to do the whole super-enjoyable process over again when I decide to make some minor alteration. 
(sarcasm confirmed)
Same goes for Masteries of course! I LOVE wasting my time!

But you can reorder Mastery pages.
Right?
If we can, then I've wasted a lot of hours reordering them a couple times...
What the hell, do you all have OCD? Only you can see those pages order, they effect nothing.

If the sarcasm wasn't clear enough, let me clarify by quoting my self:
> [{quoted}](name=Rapper Killer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=uooTUf9q,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-06-25T15:00:56.463+0000)
>
> (sarcasm confirmed)
You never keep something ordered, when its just for you? Oooooh....
I haven't found a way?  Maybe I'm just dumb?  Please explain.
Why the hell would you do it like that? just throw runes in book. name rune page after champ - Boooom! Anything above and beyond that is just time wasted.

If the sarcasm wasn't clear enough, let me clarify by quoting my self:
> [{quoted}](name=Rapper Killer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=uooTUf9q,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-06-25T15:00:56.463+0000)
>
> (sarcasm confirmed)

ordered rune/mastery pages is easier to remember.
So you don't have to search and read its name one by one everytime in pick phase
Yes
Yes. Please.
mastery pages too.  I want to have an organized set of runes/masteries that are easy to navigate but right now I've got 20 or so mastery pages jumbled up randomly
Lol? Who cares in what order pages are and also who needs that many rune pages?
I have 11 and I'm still planning more, and I want them ordered so I can easily figure out which page I need.  I'm sure I'm not alone.
I have 19 rune pages. While some are inactive, there is a point where i use most of them. Likewise with the masteries.

I asked this ages ago, and the thread didn't take off.  I got upset and have ignored these threads until now.  

I beckon anybody who uses more than three rune pages, "Please upvote and post to bump this thread.  This is the time and place to let Riot know that we REALLY want this feature.

Considering the spaghetti code that is League, I wouldn't be surprised if they can't implement this without creating some kind of in game bug where you can change rune pages. It's sad but there has to be some explanation for why such a simple request proves impossible.
I literally just got done doing this.  I am at 17 pages.  Just got done remaking my 8 support rune pages to my first couple pages and my like 4-5 others to the very last few pages.
Rito is just gonna Drag and Drop this .
I have asked for this before.  I want this.  Plz rito!
while you are at it, make the mastery pages too pls
totally upvoting this. have wanted this for a long time.

Mandatory upvote engaged.

I've said it before and I will say it again: I will upvote every thread about this I see until it finally happens.
Aaaaaaand still no rioter activity here.
... is mikta greek?
It's Goa'uld.
Oh lordy, we got a fellow SG-1 team member in the house!
i think you mean oh MORDY {{champion:82}}
yea please rito let me organize my shit!!!
and the mastery pages pls
FINALLY! why can't I upvote this twice?!
2016 is this still something Rito hasn't figured out how to do yet?

YES!

Have a way to reorder rune pages.
Have a way to reorder mastery pages.

Allow for longer names of pages.
Allow for the names to be fully displayed when selecting them in game (they get cut off if long).

Even better, add a way to connect a rune/master page to a set of champions (something like Item Sets can now.)  Or set to all champions.
1. {{champion:60}} 999 ping what can i do?
The technology isn't there yet.
reorder? not just that, we need more rune pages along with more mastery pages. there are over 130 champs riot, getting more unique by the second. how is 20 pages supposed to cover all of them?
First I have to be able to afford runes...
Drag and drop rune pages Rito plz.
